extendedInfo.description: ** DIRECTV WI-FI REMOTE+ (PRO)**THE best DirecTV remote for Android with no BS or empty promises!  Just pure awesomeness!  Supports Genie CLIENTS!PRO VERSION extras:Unlike competing apps, you get LOTS of cool stuff when you purchase the pro version!  For a complete Free vs. Pro comparison, see the link below:Free vs. Pro comparison: http://goo.gl/rZue9VWhy choose my app over the competition?* ACTIVE DEVELOPMENT ensures new features and bugs fixed.* MORE FEATURES AND OPTIONS than all other competing apps combined.  The only app of its kind that truly supports ALL DirecTV remote functions (including slow motion & SD/HD toggle).* OUTSTANDING SUPPORT (in-app, website and email) from a person who cares and knows the technology involved.* EXCLUSIVE (AND FREE) SHORTCUT ADD-ON allows you to create shortcuts to remote buttons, favorites, macros and the mini-guide right on your home screen.  "Free" users can install and create shortcuts with it to see how it works but they will only function when the "Pro" version is installed.* EXCLUSIVE (AND FREE) VOLUME PLUG-IN allows you to control volume on a limited number of devices right from the main remote app!  More devices will be supported in the future.  "Free" users can install and configure/test it to see if it will work with their devices but volume cannot be controlled from within the free main remote app.  "Pro" users can control volume right from within the main remote app using the volume & mute buttons!*****If you like this app, please rate it!  I'll continue to update and improve this app whether you rate it or not but great ratings make me feel all warm and fuzzy!If you have problems or requests please contact me through email as it is very difficult to properly respond in the comments section.*****REQUIREMENTS & USAGE* This app uses WiFi to control your DirecTV receivers!* Automatic discovery of your DirecTV receivers with ability to add manually.* DirecTV receivers must be networked (wired or wirelessly) and configured for EXTERNAL DEVICE ACCESS and given a UNIQUE NAME (this is not the default setting on the receivers)!* Supported models (HD only):  H21, H22, H23, H24, HR20, HR21, HR22, HR23 and HR24.  Also supports HR34 /HR44 Genie and C31/C41 clients.* For advanced users: One receiver can be controlled over 3G, etc.  See FAQ for details.Having problems getting this app to communicate with your receiver?Please see the connection troubleshooting FAQ at my website: http://goo.gl/ohqHYeMore Info:See the FAQs at the website for loads of information, troubleshooting and help!http://goo.gl/Jk7fq7--------------DIRECTV, DirecTV, Direc TV, DirectTV, Direct TV, Direct, TV, Remote, Satellite, WiFi--------------

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Works great! I love it and use it more than my expensive universal remote. Recommended
reviews.author: jason tower

reviews.title: Love love love
reviews.comment: I love this app I use it all the time.
reviews.author: christian faith

reviews.title: It doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: I can\'t get it to work on my TV for some reason.
reviews.author: Charles Simpson

reviews.title: Well designed app
reviews.comment: Looking for a directv remote app that also uses IR blaster in my S4.  This is the only one that has these features.  Very cool, lots of neat features.
reviews.author: Colin Cole

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Awsome app and thank u
reviews.author: tyler furst

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: Use this all the time and it works flawlessly. Easy to use and very intuitive. Great replacement when my rechargeable universal remote is charging.
reviews.author: Gary Bennett

reviews.title: Superb App AND Developer! !!
reviews.comment: This app is among the elite for any category of apps. The developer answers emails on weekend evenings. Whoever posts otherwise in these reviews hasn\'t taken the 45 seconds to setup the app, read a thread, or email the developer. Not trying to knock other reviewers, but this developer deserves better than ignorant users that give up before even trying to problem solve anything, then take extra time to post a negative review. c\'mon man.
reviews.author: Niel H

reviews.title: Tough to use
reviews.comment: This app was tough to use and figure out. It was not worth the money has it is not that much better than the free app. The instructions for it didn\'t help either. It is also tough to contact the producer of this app if there is a problem.
reviews.author: Larry Silva

reviews.title: Makes using DirecTV convenient!
reviews.comment: A great app that works seamlessly. With the very cool ability to make desktop shortcuts (using the plug-in), you can use Tasker and Autoshortcut to set up some nice workflows (e.g. set the input, change the volume, and change the channel). The additional plug-ins really add to an already great app. Very responsive developer. Thanks for making an app that saves time and makes DirecTV more convenient!
reviews.author: Niven Shah

reviews.title: Blown away
reviews.comment: Makes all the other DTV remote apps look like they were coded by children. Has every feature I wanted and a few I never thought were possible!  Update: Emailed the designer with a few ideas and here they ALL are just a week later. Amazing!
reviews.author: Peter Scholar

reviews.title: The only one.
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried a dozen remote apps, and this is the only one that does it right, and gets that I have more than one TV in my house.
reviews.author: Brian Klippel

reviews.comment: Love this remote
reviews.author: f spears

reviews.title: Needs a kill option in notification
reviews.comment: Would be 5 stars if it had an option to kill the app from the notification menu
reviews.author: William Picek

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I am a commercial installer, and I always recommend this app over the DirecTV iPad app. I liked the free version but paid for the pro to support the author. Worth every penny.
reviews.author: Joe Henry

reviews.title: Pretty good.
reviews.comment: Needs a new mode mimicking the Genie remote...  This is a life saver if you are out of rf range.
reviews.author: Tom Hebert

reviews.title: This app delivers a KO punch to the competition!!!
reviews.comment: This is the most awesome DirecTV related app I have tried and possibly the best app I have ever used. Save yourself some trouble and buy the PRO version right away.  Fully compatible with all genie receiver and genie mini clients ON BOTH WIFI AND 3G/4G. The documentation says that you can only control one unit via 3g/4g but you can actually control all clients including minis.  The developer responded immediately to a question I submitted.  This is an ATF!.
reviews.author: Eric Ringer

reviews.title: Now I always have a remote
reviews.comment: Kids are forever losing the remote.   This app is better than remote.   The volume addon even works the tv.
reviews.author: Marc Ducote

reviews.title: By far the best out there
reviews.comment: Vol plug in with a device with an ir emitter makes this truly universal, it\'s my remote wherever I go.  Even in hotels.  Don\'t waste your time trying
reviews.author: Paul Ghattas

reviews.title: Rock Solid
reviews.comment: Saves us power by not needing remote extenders for other receivers. Directv\'s radio remotes have too little range as an alternate, so perfect for anyone with receivers hooked into their home network.
reviews.author: Adam Buffa

reviews.title: This app ROCKS!
reviews.comment: .  This thing works.
reviews.author: Al Hydeman
